question: In the Sixth Five-Year Plan, priority was given to which of the following factors?
option1: Strengthen the infrastructure for agriculture and industry both
option2: Removal of poverty and attainment of economic self reliance
answer: Removal of poverty and attainment of economic self reliance
explanation: The Sixth Five-Year Plan marked the beginning of economic liberalization. Price controls were eliminated and ration shops were closed. This led to an increase in food prices and an increase in the cost of living.
